title: Paint Correction on 1958 Porsche Speedster - /DRIVE CLEAN
description: Paint correction is one of the most difficult—and most satisfying—detailing skills to master. In this episode, we show how to restore paint that's been damaged as a result of poor washing habits. The techniques we review can be performed by anyone with a dual-action polisher and microfiber-cutting pad (as microfiber pads are extremely safe, even for novice detailers). We also review scratches on the microscopic level and illustrate how abrasives work to remove or diminish paint scratches and imperfections.
tags: Car paint correction, scratch removal, swirl removal, paint swirl removal

asset.title: Paint Correction on 1958 Porsche Speedster - /DRIVE CLEAN
asset.description:
Paint correction is one of the most difficult—and most satisfying—detailing skills to master. In this episode, we show how to restore paint that's been damaged as a result of poor washing habits. The techniques we review can be performed by anyone with a dual-action polisher and microfiber-cutting pad (as microfiber pads are extremely safe, even for novice detailers). We also review scratches on the microscopic level and illustrate how abrasives work to remove or diminish paint scratches and imperfections. 

For a step-by-step PDF and product guide, visit us at AMMOnyc.com. If you have questions about this technique—or have other detailing questions—hit us up at Facebook.com/AMMOnyc.
asset.author: /DRIVE
